description.description: Here we go Gatsby + Strapi. A quick intro or refresher to get you started. This tutorial will assume you are already familar with Strapi
In this short article we cover how to link up Facebook Lead Forms with Zapier so that you don't need to download a Facebook CSV file manually to send to your clients or sales team.

React-Slick is a popular library for creating carousels. There is some great documentation [here](https://react-slick.neostack.com/ "here") regarding React Slick. Make sure to include the css files as well! I will give a quick rundown of the React Slick Library used in Gatsby.
Generating pages dynamically is one of the best and most powerful features when it Gatsby. Combine this using Contentful in the right way and you have a potential WordPress distruptor.
A short article on wordpress redirects with popup plugin
What I have used to get amazing images on the web with litte to no cost.

Coming from a React background with some experience in Gatsby a static site generator, I wanted to use the JAM stack to create a blazingly fast, free yet powerful ecommerce solution that could work for both small or med size companies and could scale easily. This article shows you how you can get started
Setting up Google Anaytics with Gatsby in a Jiffy. Well not quite, but this will be fairly quick and painless I promise.
How to avoid duplicate reviews in our model
This article shows how to update a review for a given user
Virtual Populate is a good solution to child embedding, especially if the child documents grow indefinitely larger.
A summary of using Query middleware (aka query hooks)
An overview of document middleware with Mongoose and when and why to use
You want to start a new project, but want to use an existing template project you already have on github. To do this ...
For those familiar with querying and aggregating data via sql, doing it in using a nosql database like mongo is very similar.
Using Express with Mongoose to find, query, filter, sort and manipulate our data to our liking.
Models are constructors or blueprints for a how we store the data. An instance of a model is a document.
Attributes that are convenient to have around but are not persisted to the mongo database.
How to point your name server to Netflify.
Grabbing images in a local file in a React App

React Hooks are a new feature of React that let you do things without classes.
Hooks useState and useEffect are covered.
Simple set up for using useRedux hook with React Hooks. Create a counter function
Google Custom Search in a React/Redux app
Logging in a user with Express using jwt and bcrypt in a React app
Express is a #1 most popular framework for developers using node.js. Express is build real world applications and simplify the complexities and amount of code needed to be written in node.js.

Validation in express with Express Validator is an easy way to validate your form fields.
